title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop machine learning models using Python, Scikit-learn, and TensorFlow to solve business problems.

title: Backend Developer
description: Build and maintain server-side applications using Flask, Node.js, and SQL. Ensure APIs are scalable and secure.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Design and implement responsive UIs using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

title: Data Scientist
description: Perform data analysis, feature engineering, and model building using Python, Pandas, and Scikit-learn.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Automate infrastructure with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD tools like Jenkins and GitHub Actions.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Deploy and manage cloud infrastructure on AWS, Azure, or GCP. Work with services like EC2, Lambda, and S3.

title: AI Research Intern
description: Assist in research and experimentation with deep learning models using PyTorch and HuggingFace Transformers.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Build Android and iOS applications using Flutter or React Native with strong focus on UI/UX.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor and protect systems from security threats. Use tools like Wireshark, Firewalls, and Intrusion Detection Systems.

title: Business Analyst
description: Analyze data to generate business insights. Communicate findings using Excel, SQL, and Power BI or Tableau.
